name: MiCalorexVoice
0:
”Alexa, turn on my heater”
”Alexa, turn off my heater”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Now you can turn your Calorex heater on and off just by asking. Enter the "Voice Control" section in the "MiCalorex" application, there you will find instructions on how to log in with an account which you will use to link your heater with the "MiCalorex" skill. You can control any Calorex heater with integrated Wi-Fi functionality that you have registered in the "MiCalorex" application.
